Package org.kie.api.fluent

Interface ProcessBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NodeBuilder<ProcessBuilder,​ProcessBuilder>, NodeContainerBuilder<ProcessBuilder,​ProcessBuilder>
    public interface ProcessBuilder
extends NodeContainerBuilder<ProcessBuilder,​ProcessBuilder>
    Builder that contains methods to create a process definition.
    See Also:
    ProcessBuilderFactory
